original_text: I will give you a new heart and put a new spirit in you; I will remove from you your heart of stone and give you a heart of flesh.
korean_text: 또 새 영을 너희 속에 두고 새 마음을 너희에게 주되 너희 육신에서 굳은 마음을 제거하고 부드러운 마음을 줄 것이며

sentences.original_text: I will give you a new heart
and put a new spirit in you
I will remove from you your heart of stone
and give you a heart of flesh
